title: Mr. Saxon & the Droid
description: An alternate cover for this ASIN can be found here.Adult Content Warning: 18+Another Sci-Fi Romance from Jim NevilleThis is the 1st book in the Mr. Saxon series.Is the Universe real? If it isn't, are you a part of my imagination, or am I a part of yours? Imagine a world where every thought can be monitored. Behavior modification is as simple as inserting an algorithm. Space and time are relative. This is the world of Mr. Saxon and the Droid; a world where inappropriate behavior or thought can result in death. It is also a world where any joy can be experienced at the snap of the fingers. Intimate thought may be non-existent, but intimacy is beyond imagination. Any fantasy can be realized and the power of love can create a new life-form.  Behind the curtain of everything you think is real, is the puppet master; watching, evaluating, testing. Mr. Saxon and the Droid are the focal point of attention. They are unique and possess dangerous potential. The question is, can they be used to accomplish the observer's objectives, or should they be terminated? OTHER BOOKS IN THIS SERIES:Mr. Saxon & the Mo DroidMr. Saxon & the Thought Police
author: Jim Neville
